hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Freestanding Key: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #Bombchus (20 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Second Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Kokiri Shop#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #5# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Bongo Bongo# holds...^ #the Sun's Song# and #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Zora Scale#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Hylian Shield#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Haunted Wasteland# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: If you see something suspicious, bomb it!

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #3# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: Boing-oing!^There are times in life when one should seek the help of others...^Thus, when standing alone fails to help, stand together.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Like Like Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Fish Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Near Four Armos Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Purple Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Heart Container# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.
